title: Bi-Weekly Gaming Discussion Thread
selftext:
What are you playing, r/India? Let us use this thread to discuss any games you're playing, have played or are going to play. (Mobile and board games included!)

What game are you looking forward to? Are you a developer? Show us your wares!

Please don't just list the names of games, make sure to write a word or two about them as well.

Check out r/IndianGaming! They are an active community and also host a few co-op sessions.

**Gaming Thread is posted every two weeks on Tuesday mornings |** [**Old Threads**](https://reddit.com/r/india/search?q=Bi-Weekly+Gaming+Discussion+Thread&restrict_sr=on&sort=new&t=all)

https://preview.redd.it/xagdqefyv8n61.png?width=1487&format=png&auto=webp&s=f975f1c3093a3d9598a1da39854b03d1250bd55d
comments: I am just wondering how many people here play Genshin Impact?
i finished it yesterday. i think it's one of the best halo games.
Yeah I've heard about the campaign, but i only got the multiplayer. Wanted to play the campaign via Xbox game pass but card wasn't being accepted by Microsoft shitty service

- back4blood is an amazing co-op fps. playing with friends is when the game comes alive. killing hordes of zombies. good ol' left4dead vibes.

- forza 5 is such a beautiful racing game. it's not hardcore racing simulator. Just a colourful, enjoyable, fast-paced racing game.

- Red Dead Online is still one of the best open world games. The details & graphics are still unmatched imo. Campaign story was very powerful.
i did play via xbox gamepass. if you want, i can purchase it for you.
Currently playing Cuphead, GT Sport, Uncharted 2, Horizon Zero Dawn and Legend of Zelda Skyward Sword. Basically switching among all of them.

I dont have a nice PC. So Old games for me. I never run out of them though

**Chronicles Of Riddick  : Escape From Butcher Bay**- The game is awesome. 
BUT

I was surprised when it was listed as one of the best stealth games though. A big part of stealth games is emphasising pacifist playthroughs and multiple options. Riddick does none of that. Every enemy is supposed to be killed . Later on you get a stun gun but its very short timed.  There arent multiple options either.  There is only one. Destroy everything and kill everyone. Sure one or two times you can go through by taking one choice instead of the either. But only a few times. Other than that its pretty. Very beautiful. Its fun. The darkness feels real comfortable. Riddick is badass. I recommend the Trilogy of movies for anyone who wants to see a good fun movie.
You can use Paytm payments Bank visa card which is issue by Paytm digitally very easily for payment on Microsoft Store. I use same as all my other cards don't work.

Grand theft auto

Red dead redemption

Games are addictive. Even though I play only CoD Mobile. How do you restrict yourself to play healthily only few hours in a week?
In my case, I don't have much work past few months. Hence was wasting my time playing a lot when I can productively do other things in my to do list. I had to uninstall game with great will so that I won't play again and waste time.
Batman Arkham Knight. I know I am six years late but this game is blowing my mind!

I've been playing Immortals Fenyx Rising after finishing Guardians of the Galaxy a week or so ago. The latter was a focused, nice single player experience with good comedy, only let down by repetitive and limited combat. The former, is just a Ubisoft-clone of BOTW, but it has been okayish till now. Ymmv.
The game had a lot of technical issues at launch, but apart from the excessive usage of the Bat-mobile, it was a very good game, imho.
Made platinum rank in Halo Infinite. Picked up a Switch OLED for Christmas.
I've just completed act 1 of Inscryption. It's a brilliant game that just blew my mind once i learned that the game wants me to use the system to my advantage.
